class.name: commander.tasks.knowledges.Delay
class.description: The knowledge of the 'Delay' mission. This knowledge is used by the commander agent to perform this mission.

method.name: getObstacles
method.description: Returns the obstacles to errect. This method returns an empty table if no obstacles are issued.

method.name: getScreenPositions
method.description: Returns the screen positions for scout platoon (those positions are required by the "screen" mission).

method.name: getDelayObjectives
method.description: Returns the objectives (positions) for the "Delay" mission.

method.name: getNbrFront
method.description: Returns the number of front units.

method.name: getWithImprovement
method.description: Returns the value of the "withImprovement" parameter.
